lead_paragraph: The Shiite Muslims were sentenced to death on Thursday and others were sentenced to life in prison after being convicted of killing three police officers last year, the public prosecution office announced.

headline.main: Bahrain: 3 Sentenced to Die for Attack
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: 3 Sentenced to Die for Attack

snippet: The Shiite Muslims were sentenced to death on Thursday and others were sentenced to life in prison after being convicted of killing three police officers last year, the public prosecution office announced.
